title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
Keep your fridge clear and easy to use with this simple, sturdy Ice Scraper.

What it is:
- A small hand tool that removes ice and frost from your refrigerator or freezer.
- Size: about 17 cm long and 4.5 cm wide. Easy to hold and store in a drawer.
- Colors: blue, gray, or pink (actual shade may look a little different due to lighting).

Why it’s helpful:
- Works quickly: the stainless steel blade lifts ice and frost so you don’t have to chip or struggle.
- Comfortable grip: the handle is made of PP plastic, which is light and easy to hold.
- Durable: strong materials designed for everyday home use.

How to use:
1) Hold the handle firmly.
2) Gently slide the metal edge under the ice or frost.
3) Push or lift to remove the buildup.
4) Wipe the area dry with a cloth.

What you get:
- 1 Fridge Ice Scraper.

Good to know:
- There may be a tiny size difference of about 1–5 mm from the measurements listed.
- Color may vary slightly from what you see on your screen.

This handy tool makes defrosting safer, faster, and easier—so your food stays fresh and your freezer works better, with less effort from you.
